divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside to get ready to go to town. Noticed something moving up from the southeast, couldn't make out at first, then when it was directly above me, about 500 feet up, you could make a triangle shape. Relatively small about the size of a conventional aircraft. Made Zero noise. Move of to the North very slowly. When it was roughly 3 miles out it lit up very bright, and then vanished. The flash was bright enough to illumated the tree tops at my house.
